mainHero.title: Discover new tastes with
mainHero.subtitle: TastyTriples
mainHero.description: TastyTriples is an academic project dedicated to discovering and exploring restaurants. Leveraging Semantic Web technologies such as Linked Data, JSON-LD, and SPARQL, our platform enables users to find detailed information about various restaurants.

items.title: Discover Nearby Restaurants
items.description: Effortlessly explore nearby restaurants offering diverse cuisines and delivery services in your area.

items.title: Personalized Restaurant Recommendations
items.description: Receive tailored restaurant suggestions based on your preferences, including favorite restaurants, proximity, and pricing options.

features.title: Technologies
features.subtitle: Technologies used in TastyTriples
features.description: Explore the innovative technologies that drive TastyTriples, enabling a seamless restaurant discovery experience.

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
